channel.title: Development Team for 317
channel.description:
Ok so I think I get the point of this board. Anyway, I'm putting together a development team for my server. I'm gonna eventually have 3, but right now we will be working on the 317 version. When we are finished, we will release it and move on.
~ 317 Team ~
Owner + Coder: Me Owner + Coder: - open - Owner: My irl friend... Admin + Coder: - open - Admin + Coder: - open - Admin + Coder: - open - Admin: SKILLING Mod + Coder: - open - Mod + Coder: - open - Mod + Coder: - open - Mod + Coder: - open - Mod: - open - Coder: - open - Coder: - open - Coder: - open - Coder: - open - Coder: - open - Hoster: - open -
So yeah I'm not a dumb ass coder who doesn't know anything, but I'm kinda a lazy coder so I want help. Plus I'm pretty sure there's some things I don't know... Just apply with this and I'll probably accept you.
What deob are you applying for? (317, 508, or 562) What position are you applying for? (owner, coder, admin etc.) How good are you at the position? How long have you been doing it? How mature are you? Will you be somewhat dedicated??
Kthnxbai. I've already started btw so hurry up and join pl0x.
EDIT: We're only working on CODING right now, we'll work with gfx, clients, etc. later.
EDIT: Fixed spelling :P
EDIT: Since i'm not doing 508+ for along time removed them.

item.title: Development Team for 317
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:352233”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=448586.msg3300234#msg3300234 date=1281244058]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=448586.msg3299899#msg3299899 date=1281220435]
what the FUCK is a debob?
[/quote]he meant deob. Where do you think cache’s come from?
[/quote]You’re dumb. The deob has nothing to do with the cache, and a deob is NOT a version. A ‘deob’ means de-obfuscation, which is how we make the decompiled client files readable. Anyone that calls a deob a client version is wrong and/or dumb.[/quote]

Beat me to it. -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Development Team for 317
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:11, topic:352233”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=448586.msg3299899#msg3299899 date=1281220435]
what the FUCK is a debob?
[/quote]he meant deob. Where do you think cache’s come from?[/quote]You’re dumb. The deob has nothing to do with the cache, and a deob is NOT a version. A ‘deob’ means de-obfuscation, which is how we make the decompiled client files readable. Anyone that calls a deob a client version is wrong and/or dumb.

Read full topic

@Spotted_Muffin wrote:

What debob are you applying for?
317

What position are you applying for?
coder

How good are you at the position?
Fairly good not the best not the worst but i know what to do

How long have you been doing it?
umm well only about a couple months im decent i learn fast

How mature are you?
hmm well im not some little kid that bugs people. im pretty mature i would say i dont scream or cus so idk you tell me haha

Will you be somewhat dedicated?
yea
